scenes.action_text: A PRAYER BEFORE DAWN Written by Jonathan Hirschbein based on the book "A Prayer Before Dawn" by Billy Moore February 23, 2016 "This is a story of one man's fight against himself, knowing he would never win but trying anyway. Every fucking day of it was a war." - Billy Moore 2. Based on a true story 1 INT. SHACK (THAILAND) - NIGHT - ON A MAN'S HANDS 1 strong...raw skin,
